What are the treatments for congenital hepatic fibrosis ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of congenital hepatic fibrosis:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Congenital Hepatic Fibrosis Overview  - Genetic Testing Registry: Congenital hepatic fibrosis   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery
